option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/grey_50" android:fillViewport="true">
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<!-- Top Header Section (Clean White) --> <View android:id="@+id/header_background" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="200dp" android:background="@color/pure_white" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- Header Content --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/header_content" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="24dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Add New Event" android:textSize="28sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" />
android:padding="24dp"> android:layout_width="wrap_content" <!-- Event Title Section --> <TextView android:layout_height="wrap_content" <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Image Preview --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/iv_event_image_preview" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="180dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:text="Event Title" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" /> android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" />
<!-- Event Title --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout style="@style/Widget.UniVibe.TextInputLayout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Event Title" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp"> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/et_event_title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="text" android:padding="12dp" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Location --> android:layout_marginBottom="20dp" android:hint="Enter event title"> android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Location" android:id="@+id/et_event_title"
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/et_event_location" android:textSize="16sp" android:padding="16dp" />
android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="text" <!-- Event Description Section --> <TextView android:text="Event Description" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" /> <Spinner android:id="@+id/spinner_category" android:layout_marginBottom="20dp" android:hint="Enter event description" app:counterEnabled="true" app:counterMaxLength="500">
<!-- Description --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout style="@style/Widget.UniVibe.TextInputLayout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Event Description" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp">
android:gravity="top" android:textSize="16sp" android:padding="16dp" />
<!-- Event Date Section --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Event Date & Time" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" /> android:inputType="none"
android:clickable="true" android:textSize="16sp" android:padding="16dp" />
android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" android:hint="Tap to select date & time" app:startIconDrawable="@drawable/ic_calendar" <!-- Info Card --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="0dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/grey_100">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:textStyle="bold" app:icon="@drawable/ic_add" app:iconGravity="textStart" android:paddingVertical="16dp" /> android:gravity="center_vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" <!-- Bottom Spacing --> <Space android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="32dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/form_card" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
android:text="" android:textSize="24sp" android:layout_marginEnd="12dp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Make your event stand out with a catchy title and detailed description!" android:textSize="13sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:lineSpacingExtra="2dp" />
</LinearLayout>
</com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView> android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="60dp" android:hint="Date & Time" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/et_event_date" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:focusable="false" android:padding="12dp" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Progress Bar --> <ProgressBar android:id="@+id/progress_bar" style="?android:attr/progressBarStyleLarge" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:visibility="gone" android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" />
<!-- Save Button --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_save_event" style="@style/Widget.UniVibe.Button" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="56dp" android:text="Create Event" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
</LinearLayout>
</com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
</ScrollView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/grey_50" android:fillViewport="true">
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<!-- Toolbar --> <com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar android:id="@+id/toolbar" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@color/pure_white" android:theme="@style/ThemeOverlay.MaterialComponents.ActionBar" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:titleTextAppearance="@style/TextAppearance.UniVibe.Toolbar" />
<!-- Main Form Card --> <com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView android:id="@+id/form_card" style="@style/Widget.UniVibe.CardView" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginHorizontal="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="2dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/toolbar" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Image Preview --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/iv_event_image_preview" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="180dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:visibility="gone" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" android:contentDescription="@string/add_event" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_pick_image" style="@style/Widget.UniVibe.Button.Outlined" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="40dp" android:text="Pick Image" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" />
<!-- Event Title --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout style="@style/Widget.UniVibe.TextInputLayout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Event Title" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/et_event_title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="text" android:padding="12dp" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Location --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout style="@style/Widget.UniVibe.TextInputLayout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Location" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/et_event_location" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="text" android:padding="12dp" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Category Spinner --> <Spinner android:id="@+id/spinner_category" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" />
<!-- Description --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout style="@style/Widget.UniVibe.TextInputLayout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Event Description" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/et_event_description" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:inputType="textMultiLine" android:minLines="4" android:maxLines="6" android:padding="12dp" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Date/Time --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout style="@style/Widget.UniVibe.TextInputLayout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Date & Time" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/et_event_date" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:focusable="false" android:padding="12dp" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Progress Bar --> <ProgressBar android:id="@+id/progress_bar" style="?android:attr/progressBarStyleLarge" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:visibility="gone" android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" />
<!-- Save Button --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_save_event" style="@style/Widget.UniVibe.Button" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="56dp" android:text="Create Event" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
</LinearLayout>
</com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
</ScrollView>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.coordinatorlayout.widget.CoordinatorLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/grey_50">
<!-- Clean White AppBar --> <com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout android:id="@+id/appBarLayout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@color/pure_white" android:elevation="0dp">
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Discover Title --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tv_discover_title" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/discover_title" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" />
<!-- Search Icon --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/iv_search" android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_search" android:contentDescription="@string/search_hint" app:tint="@color/text_primary" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
<!-- Filter Tabs --> <HorizontalScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:scrollbars="none" android:paddingHorizontal="16dp" android:paddingBottom="12dp">
<com.google.android.material.chip.ChipGroup android:id="@+id/chip_group_filters" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:singleSelection="true" app:selectionRequired="true">
<com.google.android.material.chip.Chip android:id="@+id/chip_all" style="@style/Widget.UniVibe.Chip.Filter" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/tab_all" android:checked="true" />
<com.google.android.material.chip.Chip android:id="@+id/chip_events" style="@style/Widget.UniVibe.Chip.Filter" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/tab_events" />
<com.google.android.material.chip.Chip android:id="@+id/chip_transport" style="@style/Widget.UniVibe.Chip.Filter" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/tab_transport" />
<com.google.android.material.chip.Chip android:id="@+id/chip_lost_found" style="@style/Widget.UniVibe.Chip.Filter" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/tab_lost_found" />
</com.google.android.material.chip.ChipGroup>
</HorizontalScrollView>
</com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout>
<!-- Event Grid (2 columns) --> <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/events_recycler_view" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:clipToPadding="false" android:paddingBottom="80dp" android:padding="16dp" app:layoutManager="androidx.recyclerview.widget.GridLayoutManager" app:spanCount="2" app:layout_behavior="@string/appbar_scrolling_view_behavior" />
<!-- Modern FAB (Floating Action Button) --> <com.google.android.material.floatingactionbutton.FloatingActionButton android:id="@+id/fab_add_event" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="bottom|end" android:layout_marginEnd="20dp" android:layout_marginBottom="90dp" android:contentDescription="@string/add_event" app:srcCompat="@drawable/ic_add" app:tint="@color/pure_white" app:backgroundTint="@color/pure_black" app:elevation="6dp" app:borderWidth="0dp" />
<!-- Bottom Navigation --> <com.google.android.material.bottomnavigation.BottomNavigationView android:id="@+id/bottom_navigation" style="@style/Widget.UniVibe.BottomNavigationView" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="bottom" app:menu="@menu/bottom_navigation_menu" />
</androidx.coordinatorlayout.widget.CoordinatorLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.coordinatorlayout.widget.CoordinatorLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/grey_50">
<!-- Clean White AppBar --> <com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout android:id="@+id/appBarLayout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@color/pure_white" android:elevation="0dp">
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Discover Title --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tv_discover_title" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/discover_title" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" />
<!-- Search Icon --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/iv_search" android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_search" android:contentDescription="@string/search_hint" app:tint="@color/text_primary" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
<!-- Filter Tabs --> <HorizontalScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:scrollbars="none" android:paddingHorizontal="16dp" android:paddingBottom="12dp">
<com.google.android.material.chip.ChipGroup android:id="@+id/chip_group_filters" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:singleSelection="true" app:selectionRequired="true">
<com.google.android.material.chip.Chip android:id="@+id/chip_all" style="@style/Widget.UniVibe.Chip.Filter" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/tab_all" android:checked="true" android:contentDescription="@string/tab_all" />
<com.google.android.material.chip.Chip android:id="@+id/chip_events" style="@style/Widget.UniVibe.Chip.Filter" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/tab_events" android:contentDescription="@string/tab_events" />
<com.google.android.material.chip.Chip android:id="@+id/chip_transport" style="@style/Widget.UniVibe.Chip.Filter" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/tab_transport" android:contentDescription="@string/tab_transport" />
<com.google.android.material.chip.Chip android:id="@+id/chip_lost_found" style="@style/Widget.UniVibe.Chip.Filter" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/tab_lost_found" android:contentDescription="@string/tab_lost_found" />
</com.google.android.material.chip.ChipGroup>
</HorizontalScrollView>
</com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout>
<!-- Content Area --> <androidx.swiperefreshlayout.widget.SwipeRefreshLayout android:id="@+id/swipe_refresh" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" app:layout_behavior="@string/appbar_scrolling_view_behavior">
<FrameLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/events_recycler_view" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:clipToPadding="false" android:paddingBottom="80dp" android:padding="16dp" app:layoutManager="androidx.recyclerview.widget.GridLayoutManager" app:spanCount="2" />
<ProgressBar android:id="@+id/progress_bar" android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:layout_gravity="center" android:visibility="gone" />
</FrameLayout>
</androidx.swiperefreshlayout.widget.SwipeRefreshLayout>
<!-- Modern FAB (Floating Action Button) --> <com.google.android.material.floatingactionbutton.FloatingActionButton android:id="@+id/fab_add_event" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="bottom|end" android:layout_marginEnd="20dp" android:layout_marginBottom="90dp" android:contentDescription="@string/add_event" app:srcCompat="@drawable/ic_add" app:tint="@color/pure_white" app:backgroundTint="@color/pure_black" app:elevation="6dp" app:borderWidth="0dp" />
<!-- Bottom Navigation --> <com.google.android.material.bottomnavigation.BottomNavigationView android:id="@+id/bottom_navigation" style="@style/Widget.UniVibe.BottomNavigationView" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="bottom" app:menu="@menu/bottom_navigation_menu" />
</androidx.coordinatorlayout.widget.CoordinatorLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.coordinatorlayout.widget.CoordinatorLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/grey_50">
<com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar android:id="@+id/toolbar" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@color/pure_white" android:theme="@style/ThemeOverlay.MaterialComponents.ActionBar" />
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:text="Profile screen placeholder" />
</androidx.coordinatorlayout.widget.CoordinatorLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.coordinatorlayout.widget.CoordinatorLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/grey_50">
<com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar android:id="@+id/toolbar" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@color/pure_white" android:theme="@style/ThemeOverlay.MaterialComponents.ActionBar" />
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:text="Search screen placeholder" />
</androidx.coordinatorlayout.widget.CoordinatorLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="8dp" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp" app:cardElevation="4dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Event Category Badge --> <TextView android:id="@+id/event_category" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Category" android:textSize="12sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:background="@android:color/holo_blue_dark" android:paddingStart="8dp" android:paddingEnd="8dp" android:paddingTop="4dp" android:paddingBottom="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<!-- Event Title --> <TextView android:id="@+id/event_title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Event Title" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@android:color/black" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<!-- Event Description --> <TextView android:id="@+id/event_description" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Event description goes here..." android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" android:maxLines="3" android:ellipsize="end" />
<!-- Event Date --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text=" " android:textSize="14sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/event_date" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Nov 17, 2025 - 5:00 PM" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@android:color/black" /> </LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="8dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="2dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="12dp" android:background="@color/pure_white">
<!-- Event Image --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/event_image" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="140dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" android:contentDescription="@string/add_event" />
<!-- Event Category Badge --> <TextView android:id="@+id/event_category" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Category" android:textSize="12sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/pure_white" android:backgroundTint="@color/pure_black" android:paddingStart="8dp" android:paddingEnd="8dp" android:paddingTop="4dp" android:paddingBottom="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<!-- Event Title --> <TextView android:id="@+id/event_title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Event Title" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp" />
<!-- Event Location and Date Row --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<TextView android:id="@+id/event_location" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Location" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/event_date" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Nov 17, 2025" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" /> </LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
<!-- Base Application Theme --> <style name="Base.Theme.UniVibe" parent="Theme.Material3.Light.NoActionBar"> <!-- Primary colors --> <item name="colorPrimary">@color/pure_black</item> <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">@color/grey_800</item> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/pure_white</item>
<!-- Secondary colors --> <item name="colorSecondary">@color/grey_500</item> <item name="colorSecondaryVariant">@color/grey_600</item> <item name="colorOnSecondary">@color/pure_white</item>
<!-- Background colors --> <item name="android:colorBackground">@color/grey_50</item> <item name="colorSurface">@color/pure_white</item> <item name="colorOnBackground">@color/text_primary</item> <item name="colorOnSurface">@color/text_primary</item>
<!-- Status bar --> <item name="android:statusBarColor">@color/pure_white</item> <item name="android:windowLightStatusBar">true</item>
<!-- Navigation bar --> <item name="android:navigationBarColor">@color/pure_white</item>
<!-- Error color --> <item name="colorError">@color/error</item> <item name="colorOnError">@color/pure_white</item> </style>
<!-- Main Application Theme --> <style name="Theme.UniVibe" parent="Base.Theme.UniVibe"> <item name="android:windowBackground">@color/grey_50</item> <item name="android:windowContentOverlay">@null</item> </style>
<!-- ========== TYPOGRAPHY STYLES ========== -->
<style name="TextAppearance.UniVibe.Display" parent="TextAppearance.Material3.DisplayLarge"> <item name="android:textSize">32sp</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/text_primary</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif-medium</item> </style>
<style name="TextAppearance.UniVibe.Headline" parent="TextAppearance.Material3.HeadlineMedium"> <item name="android:textSize">24sp</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/text_primary</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif-medium</item> </style>
<style name="TextAppearance.UniVibe.Title" parent="TextAppearance.Material3.TitleMedium"> <item name="android:textSize">20sp</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/text_primary</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif-medium</item> </style>
<style name="TextAppearance.UniVibe.Body" parent="TextAppearance.Material3.BodyLarge"> <item name="android:textSize">16sp</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/text_primary</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif</item> </style>
<style name="TextAppearance.UniVibe.BodySmall" parent="TextAppearance.Material3.BodyMedium"> <item name="android:textSize">14sp</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/text_secondary</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif</item> </style>
<style name="TextAppearance.UniVibe.Caption" parent="TextAppearance.Material3.BodySmall"> <item name="android:textSize">12sp</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/text_tertiary</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif</item> </style>
<!-- ========== BUTTON STYLES ========== -->
<style name="Widget.UniVibe.Button" parent="Widget.Material3.Button"> <item name="android:textColor">@color/text_on_dark</item> <item name="backgroundTint">@color/button_primary</item> <item name="cornerRadius">12dp</item> <item name="android:textAllCaps">false</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif-medium</item> <item name="android:paddingTop">14dp</item> <item name="android:paddingBottom">14dp</item> <item name="android:minHeight">48dp</item> </style>
<style name="Widget.UniVibe.Button.Outlined" parent="Widget.Material3.Button.OutlinedButton"> <item name="android:textColor">@color/text_primary</item> <item name="strokeColor">@color/grey_200</item> <item name="cornerRadius">12dp</item> <item name="android:textAllCaps">false</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif-medium</item> </style>
<style name="Widget.UniVibe.Button.Text" parent="Widget.Material3.Button.TextButton"> <item name="android:textColor">@color/text_primary</item> <item name="cornerRadius">12dp</item> <item name="android:textAllCaps">false</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif-medium</item> </style>
<style name="Widget.UniVibe.Button.Grey" parent="Widget.Material3.Button"> <item name="android:textColor">@color/button_secondary_text</item> <item name="backgroundTint">@color/button_secondary</item> <item name="cornerRadius">12dp</item> <item name="android:textAllCaps">false</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif-medium</item> </style>
<!-- ========== CARD STYLES ========== -->
<style name="Widget.UniVibe.CardView" parent="Widget.Material3.CardView.Elevated"> <item name="cardBackgroundColor">@color/card_background</item> <item name="cardCornerRadius">16dp</item> <item name="cardElevation">2dp</item> <item name="strokeWidth">0dp</item> </style>
<style name="Widget.UniVibe.CardView.Outlined" parent="Widget.Material3.CardView.Outlined"> <item name="cardBackgroundColor">@color/card_background</item> <item name="cardCornerRadius">16dp</item> <item name="strokeColor">@color/card_border</item> <item name="strokeWidth">1dp</item> </style>
<!-- ========== TEXT INPUT STYLES ========== -->
<style name="Widget.UniVibe.TextInputLayout" parent="Widget.Material3.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox"> <item name="boxStrokeColor">@color/input_border_focused</item> <item name="boxStrokeWidth">1dp</item> <item name="boxCornerRadiusTopStart">12dp</item> <item name="boxCornerRadiusTopEnd">12dp</item> <item name="boxCornerRadiusBottomStart">12dp</item> <item name="boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd">12dp</item> <item name="hintTextColor">@color/text_tertiary</item> <item name="android:textColorHint">@color/input_placeholder</item> </style>
<!-- ========== BOTTOM NAVIGATION STYLE (UPDATED - MODERN) ========== -->
<style name="Widget.UniVibe.BottomNavigationView" parent="Widget.Material3.BottomNavigationView"> <item name="itemIconTint">@color/bottom_nav_selector</item> <item name="itemTextColor">@color/bottom_nav_selector</item> <item name="android:background">@drawable/bottom_nav_background</item> <item name="elevation">0dp</item> <item name="itemIconSize">24dp</item> <item name="itemPaddingTop">8dp</item> <item name="itemPaddingBottom">8dp</item> <item name="labelVisibilityMode">unlabeled</item> <item name="itemActiveIndicatorStyle">@null</item> </style>
<!-- ========== TOOLBAR STYLE ========== -->
<style name="Widget.UniVibe.Toolbar" parent="Widget.Material3.Toolbar"> <item name="android:background">@color/pure_white</item> <item name="titleTextColor">@color/text_primary</item> <item name="android:elevation">0dp</item> </style>
<!-- ========== CHIP STYLES ========== -->
<style name="Widget.UniVibe.Chip.Filter" parent="Widget.Material3.Chip.Filter"> <item name="chipBackgroundColor">@color/chip_background_selector</item> <item name="chipStrokeColor">@color/grey_200</item> <item name="chipStrokeWidth">0dp</item> <item name="chipCornerRadius">20dp</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/chip_text_selector</item> <item name="checkedIconVisible">false</item> </style>
<!-- ========== TAB LAYOUT STYLE ========== -->
<style name="Widget.UniVibe.TabLayout" parent="Widget.Material3.TabLayout"> <item name="tabTextColor">@color/text_tertiary</item> <item name="tabSelectedTextColor">@color/text_primary</item> <item name="tabIndicatorColor">@color/pure_black</item> <item name="tabIndicatorHeight">2dp</item> <item name="android:background">@color/pure_white</item> </style>
<!-- ========== SPLASH SCREEN THEME ========== -->
<style name="Theme.UniVibe.Splash" parent="Theme.UniVibe"> <item name="android:windowBackground">@color/pure_white</item> <item name="android:statusBarColor">@color/pure_white</item> </style>
</resources>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <resources xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
<!-- Base Application Theme --> <style name="Base.Theme.UniVibe" parent="Theme.Material3.Light.NoActionBar"> <!-- Primary colors --> <item name="colorPrimary">@color/pure_black</item> <item name="colorPrimaryVariant">@color/grey_800</item> <item name="colorOnPrimary">@color/pure_white</item>
<!-- Secondary colors --> <item name="colorSecondary">@color/grey_500</item> <item name="colorSecondaryVariant">@color/grey_600</item> <item name="colorOnSecondary">@color/pure_white</item>
<!-- Background colors --> <item name="android:colorBackground">@color/grey_50</item> <item name="colorSurface">@color/pure_white</item> <item name="colorOnBackground">@color/text_primary</item> <item name="colorOnSurface">@color/text_primary</item>
<!-- Status bar --> <item name="android:statusBarColor">@color/pure_white</item> <item name="android:windowLightStatusBar">true</item>
<!-- Navigation bar --> <item name="android:navigationBarColor">@color/pure_white</item>
<!-- Error color --> <item name="colorError">@color/error</item> <item name="colorOnError">@color/pure_white</item> </style>
<!-- Main Application Theme --> <style name="Theme.UniVibe" parent="Base.Theme.UniVibe"> <item name="android:windowBackground">@color/grey_50</item> <item name="android:windowContentOverlay">@null</item> </style>
<!-- ========== TYPOGRAPHY STYLES ========== -->
<style name="TextAppearance.UniVibe.Display" parent="TextAppearance.Material3.DisplayLarge"> <item name="android:textSize">32sp</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/text_primary</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif-medium</item> </style>
<style name="TextAppearance.UniVibe.Headline" parent="TextAppearance.Material3.HeadlineMedium"> <item name="android:textSize">24sp</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/text_primary</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif-medium</item> </style>
<style name="TextAppearance.UniVibe.Title" parent="TextAppearance.Material3.TitleMedium"> <item name="android:textSize">20sp</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/text_primary</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif-medium</item> </style>
<style name="TextAppearance.UniVibe.Body" parent="TextAppearance.Material3.BodyLarge"> <item name="android:textSize">16sp</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/text_primary</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif</item> </style>
<style name="TextAppearance.UniVibe.BodySmall" parent="TextAppearance.Material3.BodyMedium"> <item name="android:textSize">14sp</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/text_secondary</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif</item> </style>
<style name="TextAppearance.UniVibe.Caption" parent="TextAppearance.Material3.BodySmall"> <item name="android:textSize">12sp</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/text_tertiary</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif</item> </style>
<!-- Toolbar Title TextAppearance (added) --> <style name="TextAppearance.UniVibe.Toolbar" parent="TextAppearance.Material3.TitleMedium"> <item name="android:textSize">18sp</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/text_primary</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif-medium</item> </style>
<!-- ========== BUTTON STYLES ========== -->
<style name="Widget.UniVibe.Button" parent="Widget.Material3.Button"> <item name="android:textColor">@color/text_on_dark</item> <item name="backgroundTint">@color/button_primary</item> <item name="cornerRadius">12dp</item> <item name="android:textAllCaps">false</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif-medium</item> <item name="android:paddingTop">14dp</item> <item name="android:paddingBottom">14dp</item> <item name="android:minHeight">48dp</item> </style>
<style name="Widget.UniVibe.Button.Outlined" parent="Widget.Material3.Button.OutlinedButton"> <item name="android:textColor">@color/text_primary</item> <item name="strokeColor">@color/grey_200</item> <item name="cornerRadius">12dp</item> <item name="android:textAllCaps">false</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif-medium</item> </style>
<style name="Widget.UniVibe.Button.Text" parent="Widget.Material3.Button.TextButton"> <item name="android:textColor">@color/text_primary</item> <item name="cornerRadius">12dp</item> <item name="android:textAllCaps">false</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif-medium</item> </style>
<style name="Widget.UniVibe.Button.Grey" parent="Widget.Material3.Button"> <item name="android:textColor">@color/button_secondary_text</item> <item name="backgroundTint">@color/button_secondary</item> <item name="cornerRadius">12dp</item> <item name="android:textAllCaps">false</item> <item name="android:fontFamily">sans-serif-medium</item> </style>
<!-- ========== CARD STYLES ========== -->
<style name="Widget.UniVibe.CardView" parent="Widget.Material3.CardView.Elevated"> <item name="cardBackgroundColor">@color/card_background</item> <item name="cardCornerRadius">16dp</item> <item name="cardElevation">2dp</item> <item name="strokeWidth">0dp</item> </style>
<style name="Widget.UniVibe.CardView.Outlined" parent="Widget.Material3.CardView.Outlined"> <item name="cardBackgroundColor">@color/card_background</item> <item name="cardCornerRadius">16dp</item> <item name="strokeColor">@color/card_border</item> <item name="strokeWidth">1dp</item> </style>
<!-- ========== TEXT INPUT STYLES ========== -->
<style name="Widget.UniVibe.TextInputLayout" parent="Widget.Material3.TextInputLayout.OutlinedBox"> <item name="boxStrokeColor">@color/input_border_focused</item> <item name="boxStrokeWidth">1dp</item> <item name="boxCornerRadiusTopStart">12dp</item> <item name="boxCornerRadiusTopEnd">12dp</item> <item name="boxCornerRadiusBottomStart">12dp</item> <item name="boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd">12dp</item> <item name="hintTextColor">@color/text_tertiary</item> <item name="android:textColorHint">@color/input_placeholder</item> </style>
<!-- ========== BOTTOM NAVIGATION STYLE (UPDATED - MODERN) ========== -->
<style name="Widget.UniVibe.BottomNavigationView" parent="Widget.Material3.BottomNavigationView"> <item name="itemIconTint">@color/bottom_nav_selector</item> <item name="itemTextColor">@color/bottom_nav_selector</item> <item name="android:background">@drawable/bottom_nav_background</item> <item name="elevation">0dp</item> <item name="itemIconSize">24dp</item> <item name="itemPaddingTop">8dp</item> <item name="itemPaddingBottom">8dp</item> <item name="labelVisibilityMode">unlabeled</item> <item name="itemActiveIndicatorStyle">@null</item> </style>
<!-- ========== TOOLBAR STYLE ========== -->
<style name="Widget.UniVibe.Toolbar" parent="Widget.Material3.Toolbar"> <item name="android:background">@color/pure_white</item> <item name="titleTextColor">@color/text_primary</item> <item name="android:elevation">0dp</item> </style>
<!-- ========== CHIP STYLES ========== -->
<style name="Widget.UniVibe.Chip.Filter" parent="Widget.Material3.Chip.Filter"> <item name="chipBackgroundColor">@color/chip_background_selector</item> <item name="chipStrokeColor">@color/grey_200</item> <item name="chipStrokeWidth">0dp</item> <item name="chipCornerRadius">20dp</item> <item name="android:textColor">@color/chip_text_selector</item> <item name="checkedIconVisible">false</item> </style>
<!-- ========== TAB LAYOUT STYLE ========== -->
<style name="Widget.UniVibe.TabLayout" parent="Widget.Material3.TabLayout"> <item name="tabTextColor">@color/text_tertiary</item> <item name="tabSelectedTextColor">@color/text_primary</item> <item name="tabIndicatorColor">@color/pure_black</item> <item name="tabIndicatorHeight">2dp</item> <item name="android:background">@color/pure_white</item> </style>
<!-- ========== SPLASH SCREEN THEME ========== -->
<style name="Theme.UniVibe.Splash" parent="Theme.UniVibe"> <item name="android:windowBackground">@color/pure_white</item> <item name="android:statusBarColor">@color/pure_white</item> </style>
</resources>
